ca.ualberta.cs.team5geotopics

Class BitmapJsonConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.ualberta.cs.team5geotopics.BitmapJsonConverter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.google.gson.JsonDeserializer<Bitmap>, com.google.gson.JsonSerializer<Bitmap>

    public class BitmapJsonConverter
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.google.gson.JsonDeserializer<Bitmap>, com.google.gson.JsonSerializer<Bitmap>
    Provides custom base64 serialization / deserialization for Bitmaps. Algorithm taken from: http://stackoverflow.com/questions/9224056/android-bitmap-to-base64-string
    Author:
    zjullion
